com.defano.jmonet.clipboard

Interface CanvasTransferDelegate


  • public interface CanvasTransferDelegate

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BufferedImage copySelection()
      Invoked when the user issued to "Copy" command.
      void deleteSelection()
      Invoked to delete the current selection as a result of completing a "Cut" command.
      void pasteSelection(BufferedImage image)
      Invoked to paste the given image onto the canvas.

    • Method Detail

      • copySelection

        BufferedImage copySelection()
        Invoked when the user issued to "Copy" command. A typical implementation of this method will delegate to AbstractSelectionTool.getSelectedImage().
        Returns:
        The image to be copied to the clipboard, or null if there is no selection to be copied.

      • deleteSelection

        void deleteSelection()
        Invoked to delete the current selection as a result of completing a "Cut" command. A typical implementation of this method will delegate to AbstractSelectionTool.deleteSelection(). Note that a "Cut" command is comprised of a copySelection() and deleteSelection().

      • pasteSelection

        void pasteSelection(BufferedImage image)
        Invoked to paste the given image onto the canvas. A typical implementation of this method might activate the SelectionTool on the canvas, then invoke AbstractSelectionTool.createSelection(BufferedImage, Point) to make the pasted image the current selection.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to paste onto the focused canvas.
